resources.string: Thank you for purchasing Trust Pro and supporting my work!

This Unlocker enables the additional features in the free version of Trust

Starting the Unlocker is not necessary and will just show this explanation.

NOTE: The unlocker needs to stay installed, but you can hide the icon from your app list/menu by pressing the button (might need device restart).

Further questions? Email me!
support@darken.eu

Now proceed by launching Trust
